structure.unit: Chapter 17B METROPOLITAN MIAMI-DADE COUNTY DEMOLITION OF UNINHABITABLE STRUCTURES ORDINANCE

text.section:
Sec. 17B-10. Written notice.
Within seventy-two (72) hours of posting the order to demolish an uninhabitable structure pursuant to, the Minimum Housing Enforcement Officer shall send the owner and any interested parties a written notice setting forth the defects which render the structure uninhabitable and the time within which the structure must be demolished or appeal requested. Such notice shall be sent by certified or first class mail addressed to all such parties' last known addresses as reflected in the records of the Miami-Dade County Property Appraiser. The lack of a signed return receipt shall not constitute a failure to notify interested parties.
